attributes.action: Act to prevent environmental destruction caused by "Eco-Fuels"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are petitioning the Prime Minister to think more about the environmental impact caused by the mindless application of Eco-Fuels targets (currently set to 10%). The current demand for "Eco-friendly" biofuels is massively increasing deforestation and inflating the cost of food for the world's poorest. 

We are petitioning the Prime Minister to regulate the production of biofuels to ensure they are better for the environment than traditional fuels, not worse.
